des:
With the alfanar SMART Home Skill for Amazon Alexa you can easily control your smart devices by voice command. After activating the skill, your alfanar SMART home can be linked to the Alexa account via the command "Alexa, recognize devices.". All controllable devices and up to 12 created scenes are recognized. The alfanar SMART Home Skill for Amazon Alexa can be used for the following application areas: 

Extensive lighting control 

Intelligent access control 

Motion detection 

Room climate control 

Examples of use cases with Amazon Alexa: 

Lighting control: 

"Alexa, turn on the living room light." 

"Alexa, dim the bedside lamp to 30 percent." 

Access control: 

"Alexa, what is the status of the apartment door?" 

"Alexa, is my apartment door locked?" 

Indoor climate: 

"Alexa, what is the temperature in the living room?" 

"Alexa, how warm is it in the bedroom?" 

Note: If a new device is added to the client system or the configuration is changed, the command "Alexa, detect devices." must be executed to activate the change with Alexa. 

Device name: A device can be addressed by the device name you have assigned. If the name is changed in the client portal, the command "Alexa, discover devices." must be executed again on Alexa. 

To use the alfanar SMART Home Skill, you need a alfanar SMART Home Set. Information on this can be obtained from alfanar Support: IOT@alfanar.com 

We expressly point out that the use of the alfanar SMART Home skill for Amazon Alexa is your own responsibility and therefore the general terms and conditions of business and privacy of Amazon.com Inc. apply directly to you. Recourse to the terms and conditions of alfanar is excluded in this regard.
